field.p: The Independent Review of your company's retirement plan is scheduled for {{ object.date_open }}. There is no cost or obligation of any kind attached to this review.

The objectives of this review will be as follows:
1. Analyze all costs associated with the current plan
2. Provide solutions to help increase plan efficiency through fee reductions and overall plan design.
3. Ensure the plan is compliant and structured to achieve retirement goals.
Conducting a review with an independent retirement specialist, who is in no way compensated by your plan, is the best way to ensure fees remain the lowest possible by keeping them in line with the most competitive market rates currently available. Therefore, neither the retirement specialist conducting the review nor BluStar are affiliated with your current providers.

p.span:
BluStar maintains a nationwide network of pre-qualified licensed retirement specialists whom are assigned to each review based on distinct criteria including plan size, region, and any needs specific to your plan. Prior to the meeting you will receive an email with information pertaining to the retirement specialist attached to your review. Although monitoring fees is a fiduciary responsibility, this meeting is not required by the Department of Labor.
For any additional questions, please reach a BluStar representative by simply replying to this email or calling 407-309-2540.
